androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Constra:
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="23sp" app:cardCornerRadius="19sp" app:cardElevation="20sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/background_card" tools:ignore="MissingConstraints"
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:id="@+id/cardName" android:layout_marginStart="25dp" android:layout_marginTop="19dp" android:fontFamily=""
